response.overview: In New York, former convict Pete Koslow, related to the Polish mafia, must deal with both Klimek the General, his ruthless boss, and the twisted ambitions of two federal agents, as he tries to survive and protect the lives of his loved ones.
response.title: The Informer

titles.title: The Informer - Wettlauf gegen die Zeit
The Informer - Tre Secondi Per Sopravvivere
